parameters.name: Marker
parameters.description: The `marker`. If part of a previous response is truncated, you can use this parameter to obtain the truncated part.

parameters.name: MaxItems
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. If a response is truncated because it reaches the value of `MaxItems`, the value of `IsTruncated` will be true.

Valid values: 1 to 1000. Default value: 1000.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: The status of the RAM users that you want to query. Valid values: active, freeze, and active,freeze. If you leave the parameter empty, the value active is used by default. If you specify a value for the Tag parameter, users in both states are queried.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags. A maximum number of 20 tags are supported.
